onboarding_step_1_description: Link your social media profiles to start publishing.
onboarding_step_2_description: Write and schedule your content across multiple platforms.
onboarding_step_3_description: Monitor engagement and impressions from your dashboard.
settings_description: Manage your app settings, connected accounts and preferences here.
no_profiles_found_for_network: No profiles found for {{networkName}}. Please connect an account.
no_specific_constraints: No specific video constraints defined for this network.
error_publishing_video: An error occurred while publishing the video. Please try again.
validation_error_video_metadata_failed: Failed to retrieve video metadata. Please ensure it's a valid video file.
caption: Caption
validation_error_network_required: Please select at least one network.
validation_error_profile_required: Please select at least one profile for each selected network.
validation_error_caption_too_long: Caption is too long for {{networkName}} (max {{maxLength}} characters).
validation_error_video_duration: Video duration for {{networkName}} must be between {{min}}s and {{max}}s.
validation_error_video_size: Video file size for {{networkName}} must be max {{maxSize}}MB.
no_networks_configured: No social networks configured yet. Please add accounts in Settings.
error_re_encoding_failed: Video re-encoding failed. Please try with a different file or check constraints.
error_validation_input_invalid: Please check your input. Some fields are invalid.
error_auth_credentials_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error_auth_credentials_missing: You need to be authenticated to perform this action.
error_api_network_unavailable: The social network API is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error_api_network_rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded for this social network. Please wait and try again.
error_api_provider_error: An error occurred with the social media service. Please contact support.
error_video_metadata_failed_generic: Failed to get video details. Ensure it's a valid video file.
error_video_reencode_failed_generic: Video re-encoding failed. Please check the video file or network constraints.
error_video_constraints_duration: Video duration does not meet network requirements.
error_video_constraints_ratio: Video aspect ratio does not meet network requirements.
error_video_constraints_size: Video file size exceeds network limits.
error_video_missing_file: The video file is missing or inaccessible.
error_publish_generic_failed: Failed to publish your video. Please try again.
error_publish_missing_profile: Target social media profile not found or invalid.
error_publish_network_disconnected: Social media account is disconnected or requires re-authentication.
error_db_schema_invalid: Database schema is invalid or out of date. Please contact support.
error_db_generic_error: A database error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
error_system_internal_generic: An unexpected internal error occurred. Please contact support.
troubleshooting_description: Here you can find a list of common error codes and suggested solutions.
solution_validation_check_input: Please check the provided input fields for correctness.
solution_auth_reconnect_account: Go to Settings and reconnect the social media account.
solution_auth_check_permissions: Verify the permissions granted to the application for your social media account.
solution_api_check_network_status: Check the status of the social network or provider (e.g., their website).
solution_api_retry_later: Wait for some time and then retry the publication.
solution_api_wait_and_retry: Wait for the indicated period (e.g., 1 hour) before retrying the publication.
solution_api_check_subscription: If using a paid service, check your subscription details for API limits.
solution_api_contact_support_provider: Contact the support for the social media provider (e.g., Ayrshare).
solution_video_check_file_validity: Ensure the file is a valid and uncorrupted video file (e.g., MP4, MOV).
solution_video_check_file_path: Verify that the video file exists at the specified path and is accessible.
solution_video_try_another_file_reencode: Try using a different video file, or attempt re-encoding with external software.
solution_video_contact_support: Contact support if video processing issues persist.
solution_video_adjust_reencode: Adjust video properties (duration, aspect ratio, size) using the in-app re-encoding feature or external software.
solution_video_choose_another_network: Choose an alternative social network with less restrictive video constraints.
solution_publish_check_post_details: Review your post's caption and media to ensure they meet network guidelines.
solution_publish_reconnect_profile: Go to Settings and reconnect the profile that caused the error.
solution_publish_retry_post: Retry the publication of the post.
solution_db_contact_support_db: A database error occurred. Please contact support with any relevant logs.
solution_system_restart_app: Restart the application to see if the issue is resolved.
solution_system_download_logs: Download application logs (from the Help menu, when available) and include them in your support request.
solution_system_contact_support: Contact support with details of the error and any relevant logs.
solution_default_contact_support: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support with details.
search_placeholder: Search channel by name or keyword...
no_results: No channels found for "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
error_channel_search_failed: Channel search failed. Please try again later.
error_channel_search_rate_limit: API rate limit exceeded. Please try again after some time.
error_channel_search_api_key_missing: API key missing for channel search. Please configure it in settings.
select_platform_for_search: Select a platform to search for channels.
